component.name: Yaak
component.summary: A desktop API client for organizing and executing REST, GraphQL, and gRPC requests.

description.p: ## The API client for modern developers Call REST, GraphQL, and gRPC APIs from a simple and intuitive app
## The Postman alternative you'll love Offline, modern, open source, and extendable. Get started instantly by importing your data from Postman, Insomnia, or OpenAPI.
## Make APIs a joy to use Yaak appears simple at first, but comes with everything you need
